Text: How come it doesn't come in English o.O?
Because it has been dl as a swedish version. But you can dl from Adobe.com and install in language of your choice. Just run the keygen afterwords and you'll be fine.

The keygen is good. AVG free didn't picup as a virus. The best thing to do is download the app. from Adobe website, and when the window asks you wether to install trial or full with the serial, just put the serial from the keygen and you are good to go.
